hero.title: Premium Car Rental
hero.subtitle: Redefined
hero.description: Experience luxury, comfort, and reliability with our premium fleet. Your perfect journey starts here.

features.title: Why Choose CarRent?
features.description: We provide exceptional service and premium vehicles to make your journey unforgettable.

premium_fleet.title: Premium Fleet
premium_fleet.description: Choose from our collection of luxury vehicles, all maintained to the highest standards for your comfort and safety.

support_24_7.title: 24/7 Support
support_24_7.description: Our dedicated support team is available around the clock to assist you with any questions or concerns.

best_prices.title: Best Prices
best_prices.description: Competitive rates with transparent pricing. No hidden fees, just honest pricing for exceptional service.

vehicles.popular_description: Discover our most loved vehicles, perfect for any occasion.
vehicles.why_choose_description: Experience the difference with our premium vehicle rental service.

benefits.verified_description: Every vehicle in our fleet is thoroughly inspected and certified for safety and reliability.
benefits.prices_description: Get the best value with our competitive rates and transparent pricing policy.
benefits.booking_description: Book your perfect vehicle instantly with our streamlined reservation system.

cta.ready_description: Join thousands of satisfied customers who trust CarRent for their transportation needs. Book your perfect car today!

reservation.secure_booking: Secure your vehicle booking in just a few steps
reservation.special_requests_placeholder: Any special requests or notes for the car owner...
reservation.terms_agreement: I agree to the {termsLink} and {privacyLink}, and confirm that all information provided is accurate.
reservation.cash_pending_note: Your booking will be pending until the owner confirms.
reservation.instant_booking_note: Your booking will be confirmed immediately.
reservation.confirmation_email: Your vehicle reservation has been confirmed. You'll receive a confirmation email shortly.
reservation.pending_approval: Your booking request has been submitted and is pending approval.
reservation.contact_admin: Please contact our admin to confirm your cash payment booking:
reservation.try_again_contact: Please try again or contact support if the problem persists.
